I may try a minimizer because otherwise the dress is very pretty and perfect for the hot weather.

I'm 5'3", and 130-135 pounds (very fit). I'm not too busty, but not flat either. Length on me is good for flats or sandals with a heel. It is not tight on me at all, but the reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the fabric has NO stretch at all and I'm just not used to that. I could definitely dance in it, it isn't that constricting. But it would be nice if the fabric had some stretch. I may order another color. Oh, I bought a Medium!

I got this dress for an upcoming cruise with Holland America for orange night. I got an XL. What I thought was weird was that it fit what I expected in the waist area; however, I thought it was smaller than I thought in the bust area. I’m a 36D, wear a size 16, and weigh around 190 pounds.  I would say if you are bigger than a 36D but the same size as me otherwise then order the XXL. For me it was the right fit.

I bought this dress to wear to a baby shower as I had nothing in style for this Spring!  It fit perfectly  (I went up a size based on reviews-I’m 5-8, weigh 200 and have DD bra size).  A smaller size would have been too tight in the boobs.  It arrived in 3 days.  I love it so much I just ordered another color.  I didn’t feel like material was too thin, you just need neutral undergarments with this.  I wore a beige full slip under too.  It has a cute ruffle at the sleeves and at the bottom.  I wish they had different patterns!  I’d buy them all!

This dress is really pretty. I love that it's got long length and longer sleeves for extra coverage. I ordered the blue and white print, and it's a summer classic combo. I tend to be in between a L and XL, and I ordered a L in this, but unfortunately I will have to size up. It fits really tight around the bust with no stretch, so I'd only recommend this one for those with a small or medium sized bust. I'm very very large and carry a large portion of my weight in my chest, so it doesn't work for me. Hoping the XL does, cause it's a cute dress!
